id_table_1.caption: Table 1.  Frequency of Special Characters
references: Immediately following this sentence is the point at which  Table  1  is included in the input file; compare the  placement of the table here with the table in the printed output of  this document.

id_table_2.caption: Table 2.  Some Typical Commands
references: To set a wider table, which takes up the whole width of the pages  live area, use the environment  table*  to enclose the tables  contents and the table caption. As with a single-column table, this  wide table will float to a location deemed more  desirable. Immediately following this sentence is the point at which  Table  2  is included in the input file; again, it is  instructive to compare the placement of the table here with the table  in the printed output of this document.
